title: Generative AI on Vertex AI - Imagen on Vertex AI model versions and lifecycle
abstract: # Generative AI on Vertex AI - Imagen on Vertex AI model versions and lifecycle
content:
## Feature and documentation access
This feature and documentation are available to approved users. For information about requesting access, see the [Imagen on Vertex AI overview](/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/image/overview) .
## What's next
- Learn how to send requests to specific models:- [Generate images using text prompts](/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/image/generate-images) 
- [Get image descriptions using visual captioning](/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/image/image-captioning) 
- [Use Visual Question Answering (VQA) to get image information](/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/image/visual-question-answering) 
- Learn more about model parameters using the API reference:- [Image generation](/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/model-reference/image-generation) (`imagegeneration`model)
- [Image captions](/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/model-reference/image-captioning) (`imagetext`model)
- [Visual question and answering (VQA)](/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/model-reference/visual-question-answering) (`imagetext`model)
